nodes.text: Silent Death is recurring article in Star Wars Gamer. The game first appeared in Star Wars Gamer 3 which adapts the space assault game Silent Death for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It comes with tools for players and paper tokens for play. The article also presents three pre-made scenarios. Star Wars Gamer 5 added vehicles and scenarios for Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. Additionally, Star Wars Gamer 7 added additional starships and rules for the Yuuzhan Vong invasion.
